entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing overnight. Local smoke. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 30%
